editor.message:
# Hey {{username}}, it's Boozle!
Wow, I'm proud. You made it. I've taught you I everything I could teach you. Now it's time for you to go out there, on your own adventures. As you can see, I'm also taking some time off.
I'd like to leave you with some resources: - You'll recognize some of the things I've taught you and learn about many more [in the Kotlin Tour, straight from Kotlin's creators](https://kotlinlang.org/docs/kotlin-tour-welcome.html). - You can use Kotlin to build stuff for many platforms, you'll want to [install IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/) for that.
I wish you all the best, {{username}}.
Boozle out!

stamp.alt: Postage stamp showing boozle holding the Kotlin logo
